item.title: Crack across road which now has the start of pot holes, 27th July
item.description:
Crack across road that’s been reported before and is now getting worse. The vibrations in property when HGV goes over is awful. Please don’t just look- knock on property and see for yourself the shacking of the walls. Suspect it could cause issues to property if not repaired

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering of a street tree pit, 27th July
item.description:
The large treepit outside The Firs, Venner Road, is regularly littered with mostly whisky bottles. Day after day more are added to the litter. I've given up trying to clear them because they just get replaced with more. Please could the council be asked to include the tree pit in their pavement sweeping? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 47, Venner Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chairs and dried grass been put in edge of alleyway, 27th July

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Page Crescent, North End, London

item.title: Filthy unmaintaned park, 27th July
